metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15365 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: LibRaw before 0.20-Beta3 has an out-of-bounds write in parse_exif() in metadata\exif_gps.cpp via an unrecognized AtomName and a zero value of tiff_nifds.

criterions.comment: darktable: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
